mapper.insert: insert into SOCIAL_CONTACTS (ID, SYSTEM_USER_ID, STATUSCODE, SUBACCOUNTSID, SUBTOKEN, DATECREATED, VOIPACCOUNT, VOIPPWD, FRIENDLYNAME, PHOTO, STATUS, DISABLED, SHUOSHUO,ACCOUNT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subAccountSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateCreated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voipAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voipPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{friendlyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disabled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shuoshuo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update SOCIAL_CONTACTS set SYSTEM_USER_ID = #{systemUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUSCODE = #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBACCOUNTSID = #{subAccountSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBTOKEN = #{subToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATECREATED = #{dateCreated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VOIPACCOUNT = #{voipAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VOIPPWD = #{voipPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRIENDLYNAME = #{friendlyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHOTO = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISABLED = #{disabled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHUOSHUO = #{shuoshuo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SYSTEM_USER_ID, STATUSCODE, SUBACCOUNTSID, SUBTOKEN, DATECREATED, VOIPACCOUNT, VOIPPWD, FRIENDLYNAME, PHOTO, STATUS, DISABLED, SHUOSHUO,ACCOUNT from SOCIAL_CONTACTS where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, SYSTEM_USER_ID, STATUSCODE, SUBACCOUNTSID, SUBTOKEN, DATECREATED, VOIPACCOUNT, VOIPPWD, FRIENDLYNAME, PHOTO, STATUS, DISABLED, SHUOSHUO,ACCOUNT from SOCIAL_CONTACTS WHERE DISABLED = 0

SELECT ID, SYSTEM_USER_ID, STATUSCODE, SUBACCOUNTSID, SUBTOKEN, DATECREATED, VOIPACCOUNT, VOIPPWD, FRIENDLYNAME, PHOTO, STATUS, DISABLED, SHUOSHUO,ACCOUNT FROM SOCIAL_CONTACTS WHERE SYSTEM_USER_ID = #{systemUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DISABLED = 0
select FRIENDLYNAME, PHOTO, STATUS, DISABLED, SHUOSHUO,ACCOUNT from SOCIAL_CONTACTS where FRIENDLYNAME LIKE concat(concat('%',#{friendlyname ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
